alert.note: Alert for Larimer; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 11 at 8:47PM MDT until June 11 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR EAST CENTRAL LARIMER AND WEST CENTRAL WELD COUNTIES... At 847 PM MDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to 4 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring along Interstate 25 west of Windsor. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, gulches, roads, and poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... East Fort Collins, northeastern Loveland, Windsor, Wellington, Timnath, Black Hollow Reservoir and New Windsor Reservoir. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
